survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Meal Kit Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who use subscription-based meal kit services to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using a subscription-based meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to ensure clarity and ease of response on mobile devices.

script.question_text: How long have you been using a subscription-based meal kit service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following meal kit services have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option to capture additional responses.

script.question_text: Which of the following meal kit services have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to a meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option to capture additional responses.

script.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to a meal kit service?

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the quality of ingredients provided in your meal kits?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled for mobile users.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the quality of ingredients provided in your meal kits?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your meal kit service?
